articles.title: Vanessa Lachey reveals she and husband Nick realised they wanted to wed after dating other people - Daily Mail
articles.description: The TV host, 41, admitted that she and her singer husband, 48, decided to temporarily part ways and both dated one other person as she opened up about the past difficulties in their relationship.
